questions.question: How Did the Battle of Opis Start?
options: King Nabonidus attacked Cyrus the Great.
The battle began when Nabonidus sent his army to prepare for battle with Cyrus.
The battle ended with the destruction of the Persian army.
questions.correct_answer: The battle began when Nabonidus sent his army to prepare for battle with Cyrus.

questions.question: What Happened in the Battle of Opis?
options: The Persian army destroyed the Babylonian army.
questions.correct_answer: The Persian army destroyed the Babylonian army.

questions.question: What Was the Purpose of the Battle of Opis?
options: To establish peace between Babylonia and Persia.
To plunder valuable goods from the Babylonians.
To protect the Median Wall from invasion.
To defend Babylon from foreign attacks.
questions.correct_answer: To plunder valuable goods from the Babylonians.

questions.question: How Did the Babylonians Lose the Battle of Opis?
options: The Persians diverted the Euphrates River and entered Babylon.
The Persians attacked during a religious banquet.
questions.correct_answer: The Persians diverted the Euphrates River and entered Babylon.

questions.question: What Factors Contributed to the Babylonian Defeat at Opis?
options: The Babylonian walls were in good condition.
Nabonidus was popular among his people.
Nabonidus suppressed the cult of Marduk.
questions.correct_answer: Nabonidus suppressed the cult of Marduk.

questions.question: How Did the Battle of Opis Impact Mesopotamia?
options: It led to the fall of the Persian Empire.
It resulted in the fall of the Babylonian Empire and the rise of the Persian Empire.
questions.correct_answer: It resulted in the fall of the Babylonian Empire and the rise of the Persian Empire.
